article_title: Praying for the Hahns: How Christians are uniting behind Conestoga Wood Specialties owners in Obamacare fight
article_text: Suzanne Cassidy is a Lancaster Newspapers reporter. She can be reached atscassidy@lnpnews.com. You can also follow @SuzCassidyLNP on Twitter.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , conestoga wood specialties, affordable care act
article_metadata.author: SUZANNE CASSIDY | Staff Writer

og.description: This weekend, Christians here and around the country will be taking part in a “Pray for the Hahns” effort led by the Pennsylvania Family Institute.
